meanings: [명사] order, command, instructions, [동사] order, give orders[commands, instructions], command, instruct

vlive.korean: [명령 전달] [요리] 누가 하는 거예요 지금? [Delivering the order] Who's cooking now? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.103
[명령어 : 사람 살려!] 사람 살려! [Order : Help!] Help! 듣기 View video 방판소년단-SBS Plus : [방판소년단 EP63] 길바닥에서 시민에게 뺨 맞은 유명 연예인
[명령어 : 다리 찢으면서 + 물구나무] 그 상태에서 물구나무서기 가능해요? [Order : Splits + hand-standing] Can you stand on your hands? 듣기 View video 방판소년단-SBS Plus : [방판소년단 EP63] 길바닥에서 시민에게 뺨 맞은 유명 연예인
vlive.english: [Order : Splits + hand-standing] Can you stand on your hands?

vlive.korean: 명령이다. It's an order. 듣기 View video JBJ : 잘봐줘 JBJ 3화 (Just Be Joyful JBJ EP.3)
명령인가요? Is that a command? 듣기 View video Glorious Entertainment : [이호원(hoya)]촬영대기중

examples.korean: The court ordered the seizure of his assets. 발음듣기 법원이 그의 재산 몰수를 명령했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The court ordered the seizure of his assets. 발음

examples.korean: The troops were ordered back to barracks. 발음듣기 군대에게 병영으로 돌아가라는 명령이 떨어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The troops were ordered back to barracks. 발음

examples.korean: The court granted an injunction against the defendants. 발음듣기 법원에서 피고들에게 불리한 명령을 내렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The court granted an injunction against the defendants. 발음

examples.korean: He was ordered to pay damages totalling ￡30,000. 발음듣기 그는 총 3만 파운드의 손해 배상금을 지불하라는 명령을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was ordered to pay damages totalling ￡30,000. 발음

examples.korean: The general gave the order to advance. 발음듣기 장군이 진격 명령을 내렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The general gave the order to advance. 발음
